items.name: selenium
items.title: Selenium
items.body: I have used this to a slight degree in the past but would prefer use of cypress or playwright for automation testing.

items.name: graphql
items.title: GraphQL
items.body: I have used this in personal projects but have yet to gain serious professional experience of it

items.name: jquery
items.title: jQuery
items.body: I have extensive experience of jQuery and a great deal of love for it, however it's time has passed and modern technologies such as React and Angular render it outdated.

items.name: html5
items.title: HTML 5 (semantic)
items.body: As an experienced front-end developer I have extensive use and experience of semantic HTML.  It is a key tool in my toolbox.

items.name: javascript
items.title: Javascript
items.body: As an experienced front-end developer I have extensive use and experience of JavaScript.  It is a key tool in my toolbox.

items.name: less
items.title: LESS
items.body: LESS is a language extension to CSS, I have used it extensively in the past but it seems to have fallen out of favour - especially with the increase of modern component driven development and more modern alternatives.
